nodes.description: 几个月前，叙利亚边境城镇苏鲁克发生袭击，造成33人死亡。
nodes.support_text: Months earlier, another attack left 33 dead in Suruc, a town on the Syrian border.

nodes.description: 10月，两名自杀式炸弹袭击者在首都安卡拉的一次和平集会上杀害了102人。
nodes.support_text: In October, a pair of suicide bombers killed 102 people during a peace rally in the capital, Ankara.

nodes.description: 1月12日，一名ISIS成员在伊斯坦布尔历史区引爆爆炸装置，造成10人死亡，15人受伤。
nodes.support_text: The attack, in which a 28 year Saudi man identified by police as an ISIS member detonated an explosive device inside a crowd of German tourists, killing 10 people and wounding 15

nodes.description: 当地店主报告听到震耳欲聋的爆炸声，并看到人们逃离该地区。
nodes.support_text: Near the scene of the explosion, which had been cordoned off by Turkish police, local shopkeepers reported hearing a thunderous blast and seeing people fleeing the area.

nodes.description: 德国政府警告其在土耳其的公民避免人群和主要地标。
nodes.support_text: as Germany's government warned its citizens there to avoid crowds and key landmarks

nodes.description: 一些旅行社开始为前往土耳其的旅客提供免费取消服务。
nodes.support_text: and some tour agencies began to offer Turkey-bound travelers free cancellations.

nodes.description: 土耳其总理Ahmet Davutoglu致电德国总理Angela Merkel表示慰问。
nodes.support_text: Turkey's Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu called Germany's Chancellor Angela Merkel to express his condolences.

nodes.description: 警方确认自杀式炸弹袭击者是名为Nabil Fadli的ISIS成员。
nodes.support_text: In a statement, he noted that the suicide bomber, named by police as Nabil Fadli, was an ISIS member.

nodes.description: 官员确认炸弹袭击者从邻国叙利亚进入土耳其。
nodes.support_text: Other officials confirmed that the bomber had entered Turkey from neighboring Syria

nodes.description: ISIS尚未声称对这次袭击负责。
nodes.support_text: but ISIS has not yet taken responsibility for the attack.

nodes.description: 伊斯坦布尔的致命ISIS炸弹袭击威胁要对土耳其的旅游经济造成重大打击
nodes.support_text: A deadly ISIS bombing in Istanbul threatened to deal Turkey's tourist economy a major blow

nodes.description: 炸弹袭击将给土耳其旅游经济造成重大打击
nodes.support_text: A deadly ISIS bombing in Istanbul threatened to deal Turkey's tourist economy a major blow

nodes.description: 土耳其警察封锁了爆炸现场
nodes.support_text: Near the scene of the explosion, which had been cordoned off by Turkish police, local shopkeepers reported hearing a thunderous blast and seeing people fleeing the area.

nodes.description: 一位店主认为他们的窗户会破裂

nodes.description: 超过500万德国人去年访问了土耳其

nodes.description: 土耳其安全部队与叛乱的库尔德工人党之间发生致命冲突

nodes.description: 土耳其官员和旅游经营者一直担心ISIS会针对旅游区发动袭击

nodes.description: ISIS枪手在苏塞镇的一个海滩上杀害了38名主要来自英国的游客
nodes.support_text: ISIS gunmen killed 38 tourists, mainly from the United Kingdom, on a beach in the town of Sousse

nodes.description: 突尼斯经历了游客数量的大幅下降
nodes.support_text: Tunisia saw a huge drop in tourists

edges.support_text: Months earlier, another attack left 33 dead in Suruc, a town on the Syrian border. In October, a pair of suicide bombers killed 102 people during a peace rally in the capital, Ankara.

In October, a pair of suicide bombers killed 102 people during a peace rally in the capital, Ankara. This image made from footage on a tourist's camera shows an explosion at Sultanahmet Square near the historical Roman obelisk in Istanbul, Turkey, Jan. 12, 2016.
一系列暴力事件冲击了土耳其

The attack, in which a 28 year Saudi man identified by police as an ISIS member detonated an explosive device inside a crowd of German tourists, killing 10 people and wounding 15. Near the scene of the explosion, which had been cordoned off by Turkish police, local shopkeepers reported hearing a thunderous blast and seeing people fleeing the area.
A deadly ISIS bombing in Istanbul threatened to deal Turkey's tourist economy a major blow, as Germany's government warned its citizens there to avoid crowds and key landmarks

A deadly ISIS bombing in Istanbul threatened to deal Turkey's tourist economy a major blow, as Germany's government warned its citizens there to avoid crowds and key landmarks and some tour agencies began to offer Turkey-bound travelers free cancellations.

The attack, in which a 28 year Saudi man identified by police as an ISIS member detonated an explosive device inside a crowd of German tourists, killing 10 people and wounding 15. Turkey's Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu called Germany's Chancellor Angela Merkel to express his condolences.

The attack, in which a 28 year Saudi man identified by police as an ISIS member detonated an explosive device inside a crowd of German tourists, killing 10 people and wounding 15. In a statement, he noted that the suicide bomber, named by police as Nabil Fadli, was an ISIS member.

The attack, in which a 28 year Saudi man identified by police as an ISIS member detonated an explosive device inside a crowd of German tourists, killing 10 people and wounding 15. Other officials confirmed that the bomber had entered Turkey from neighboring Syria

The attack, in which a 28 year Saudi man identified by police as an ISIS member detonated an explosive device inside a crowd of German tourists, killing 10 people and wounding 15. but ISIS has not yet taken responsibility for the attack.
A deadly ISIS bombing in Istanbul threatened to deal Turkey's tourist economy a major blow

Near the scene of the explosion, which had been cordoned off by Turkish police, local shopkeepers reported hearing a thunderous blast and seeing people fleeing the area.
